{"data":{"Media":{"id":20920,"idMal":28121,"title":{"romaji":"Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka","english":"Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?","native":"\u30c0\u30f3\u30b8\u30e7\u30f3\u306b\u51fa\u4f1a\u3044\u3092\u6c42\u3081\u308b\u306e\u306f\u9593\u9055\u3063\u3066\u3044\u308b\u3060\u308d\u3046\u304b","userPreferred":"Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka"},"startDate":{"year":2015,"month":4,"day":4},"endDate":{"year":2015,"month":6,"day":27},"coverImage":{"large":"https:\/\/s4.anilist.co\/file\/anilistcdn\/media\/anime\/cover\/medium\/bx20920-3x2KtyeYQmaR.jpg","medium":"https:\/\/s4.anilist.co\/file\/anilistcdn\/media\/anime\/cover\/small\/bx20920-3x2KtyeYQmaR.jpg"},"bannerImage":"https:\/\/s4.anilist.co\/file\/anilistcdn\/media\/anime\/banner\/20920-QZeO1gVTQSUZ.jpg","format":"TV","type":"ANIME","status":"FINISHED","episodes":13,"chapters":null,"volumes":null,"season":"SPRING","description":"The story takes place in the town of labyrinths, Orario, also called \"Dungeon.\" Bell Cranel is a newbie adventurer that admires \"Having a fateful meeting with a person of the opposite gender.\" One day during an adventure, he is attacked by a Minotaur. Close to destruction, he is saved by a top-class female adventurer, Aizu Wallenstein. He falls in love with her at first sight, and begins actions to become an adventurer that is on her level. He later encounters Hestia, a god called a \"Lolita god\" due to her stature who falls in love with him.
\n
\n(Source: ANN)","averageScore":74,"meanScore":74,"genres":["Action","Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy","Romance"],"synonyms":["Danmachi","Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka: Familia Myth"],"nextAiringEpisode":null,"relations":{"edges":[{"relationType":"ADAPTATION"},{"relationType":"SPIN_OFF"},{"relationType":"SEQUEL"},{"relationType":"SEQUEL"},{"relationType":"OTHER"},{"relationType":"ALTERNATIVE"}],"nodes":[{"id":85162},{"id":21676},{"id":21660},{"id":101167},{"id":101166},{"id":85161}]}}}}
